name: Golf shoes
description: Won these shoes at a raffle, but I just bought a pair the other week. They are brand new and have never been worn and just looking to get rid of them. Size 10

name: Footjoy Golf Shoes
description: Size 9 shoes. I have only been using these for a little bit but strained my back and can't play golf anymore. They are in good condition and have a lot of life left in them.
